description.translate: Don't reveal the top of your head too quickly, beggar, you seem to be, but royal is your value.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Le Roi solitaire\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ne dévoile pas trop vite le sommet de ta tête,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mendiant, tu sembles, mais royale est ta valeur.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Don't reveal the top of your head too quickly,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7beggar, you seem to be, but royal is your value.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HER§a2\"}"]}}
